1:
"Often since my youth they have attacked me,"\q let Israel say.
\q
2:
"Often since my youth they have attacked me,\q yet they have not defeated me.
\q
3:
The plowers plowed on my back;\q they made their furrows long.


\q
4:
Yahweh is righteous;\q he has cut the ropes of the wicked."
\q
5:
May they all be put to shame and turned back,\q those who hate Zion.


\q
6:
May they be like the grass on the housetops\q that withers before it grows up,
\q
7:
that cannot fill the reaper's hand\q or the chest of the one who binds sheaves.
\q
8:
May those who pass by not say,\q "May the blessing of Yahweh be on you;
\q we bless you in the name of Yahweh."
